Herptiles

Indirana salelkari, a new species of leaping frog (Anura: Ranixalidae) from Western Ghats of Goa, India. Modak, Nikhil; Dahanukar, Neelesh; Gosavi, Ninad; Padhye, Anand D.. link
Delimiting the distribution range of Indirana leithii (Boulenger, 1888)(Anura: Ranixalidae), an endemic threatened anuran of the Western Ghats, based on molecular and morphological analysis. Modak, Nikhil; Padhye, Anand; Dahanukar, Neelesh. link
Range extension of Ferguson Toad Duttaphrynus scaber (Schneider)(Amphibia: Anura: Bufonidae) up to the northern most limit of Western Ghats, with its advertisement call analysis. Padhye, Anand; Pandit, Rohan; Patil, Rajgopal; Gaikwad, Swapnil; Dahanukar, Neelesh; Shouche, Yogesh. link
Sexual dimorphism in the Kudremukh Bush Frog (Anura: Rhacophoridae: Raorchestes tuberohumerus) of the Western Ghats, India, with a note on its distribution and conservation status. Padhye, Anand D.; Jadhav, Anushree; Sulakhe, Shauri; Dahanukar, Neelesh. link
Indirana chiravasi, a new species of leaping frog (Anura: Ranixalidae) from Western Ghats of India. Padhye, Anand D.; Modak, Nikhil; Dahanukar, Neelesh. link

INHER

Institute of Natural History Education and Research promotes scientific knowledge in natural history through research.
